title: Notch己经完成他的使命
author: rickky2
txt_content:
@notchMarkus Persson 
Next up: relaxing for a while, followed by more work!! =D

http://gamegenus.blogspot.com/2011/11/notch-exits-hands-minecraft-development.html

再见了Notch

replies.author: a919298641
replies.txt_content:
？！！？！ 是强行把他踢了.
 还是退休？

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
能量光球 发表于 2011-11-19 09:10 
只是休息下而已吧- -
所以我说的是再见，还会见的意思

replies.author: 火星蚂蚁
replies.txt_content: 好吧，刚开始以为他已经死了

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 休息过后还要弄 啦啦啦

replies.author: 侠客
replies.txt_content: Notch你已经完成你的使命了，你可以去死了（说笑，表扣分）
